article_title: The Future Of Political Engagement Is Here (And It's Called POPVOX)

article_metadata.description: Meet POPVOX – a non-partisan online platform that's translating grassroots ideas into action on Capitol Hill. POPVOX provides a 360-degree view of every bill and resolution, organized by issue area to enable easy discovery, and aggregating personal letters from people just like you, as well as professional opinions from advocacy groups and trade associations, and using location-based data to show you what Congress is actually hearing from verified constituents.
article_metadata.author: Sarah McKinney
